title: Fundamentals of Calculus
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in calculus. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Fundamentals of Linear Algebra
description: Rigorous treatment of linear algebra theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Abstract Algebra
description: Rigorous treatment of abstract algebra theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Applied Calculus
description: Rigorous treatment of calculus theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Linear Algebra
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of linear algebra. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Differential Equations
description: In-depth analysis of differential equations principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Calculus
description: Interdisciplinary approach to calculus combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Graduate Differential Equations
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of differential equations. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: MATH 365 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Linear Algebra
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in linear algebra. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MATH 332 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Statistics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in statistics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MATH 315 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Probability
description: Advanced exploration of probability covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: MATH 359 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Statistics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in statistics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MATH 356 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Differential Equations
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in differential equations. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MATH 339 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Statistics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in statistics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: MATH 314 and senior standing or graduate status
